msbt.message: Do you know what today is, ? <10_4 />It's the Bug-Off!If we all work hard today, we can make sure that is bug-free forever! Is that not the point of the event?

I've never liked the term "bugs." There are so many different kinds! It's rude to simplify like that. You've got insects, arachnids, myriapodsthe list goes on!I suppose they do have one thing in common. They all count in the Bug-Off!

You know what catching bugs is like? It's kind of like making new friends, . You can't come on too strong or you'll scare folks away. So you move in slowly with a smile. And when you finally get close, that's when you swing the net and trap them forever! Wait, what were we talking about?
You know how the Bug-Off works, right? You're trying to catch as many bugs as you can in a short time. So don't go trying to catch a whole bunch of bugs before the event, because those don't count!
You know how to enter the Bug-Off, right? Just go talk to Flick in the plaza. Me? I'm gonna pass on this one. I inhaled a bug by accident this morning and that was enough.
